content: from * 5 more times round 2 *c6b k3 p2 c2b p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 *k9 p2 c2b p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 5 repeat round 1 round 6 *k3 c6f p2 c2b p2 repeat from * 5 more times round 7 repeat round 1 round 8 repeat round 4 repeat rnds 1 8 for 2 more times repeat rnds 1 6 all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 3 decrease starts change to double pointed needles if necessary for crown shaping round 1 * k2tog k1 x 3 p2tog k2 p2tog repeat from * 5 more times 60 sts round 2 *k6 p1 k2tog p1 repeat from * 5 more times 54 sts round 3 *k6 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * 5 more times 54 sts round 4 *c4b k2 p2tog p1 repeat from * 5 more times 48 sts round 5 * k2tog k1 x 2 p2tog repeat from * 5 more times 30 sts round 6 * k2tog x 2 p1 repeat from * 5 more times 18sts round 7 k2tog to the end of round cut off yarn leaving 10 - 13 25 cm-33 cm tail bobble the tip by drawing the tapestry needle through the remaining stitches and fastening them weaving in the end on the inside of the hat use the remaining yarn to make the pompom chart 1 all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 4 finishing weave in the ends and enjoy thank you very much for downloading tiilda hat pattern i hope you will enjoy knitting it as much as i enjoyed creating it there is also a matching tiilda mittens free pattern download available in my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tiilda-mittens happy knitting and happy wearing ravelry inesesang instagram @isangknits email isangknits@gmail com all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 5
